product_name: SmartWool PhD Outdoor Medium Mini Socks - 2013 Closeout
long_description: SmartWool PhD Outdoor Medium Mini Socks feature a durable blend of wool, nylon and elastane, as well as a comfortable fit and smart design for great performance on cooler hikes. WOW(TM) (wool on wool) technology increases wool content in the heel and forefoot area, improving durability and overall comfort. 4 Degree Elite Fit System improves comfort; 2 elastics provide greater stretch and recovery to keep the socks in place. Strategically placed mesh zones provide ventilation for temperature and moisture management. Flat-knit toe seams resist wear. 3.75 in. overall height. Closeout.
short_description: SmartWool PhD Outdoor Medium Mini Socks feature a durable blend of wool, nylon and elastane, as well as a comfortable fit and smart design for great performance on cooler hikes.
